quest.name: The Hunt for Specimens
journal: The diminutive gleaner is on the lookout for an able-bodied adventurer.

dialogue.name: LITTLEGLEANER04176
dialogue.text: ...Do my eyes deceive me, or are you Forename Surname?

dialogue.name: LITTLEGLEANER04176
dialogue.text: Well, as I live and breathe, it is you. Ha! I knew I'd be the first to track you down. Who's the guildship's top hunter now, eh!?

dialogue.name: LITTLEGLEANER04176
dialogue.text: Wait─you have heard of guildship hunts, yes? They are not so different from the hunts you're familiar with in Eorzea, as I understand it. I'd wager they're rather more challenging, but an adventurer of your caliber would never turn down a challenge, would you?

dialogue.name: LITTLEGLEANER04176
dialogue.text: No, no you would not! Pray speak with Northota at the peristyle to register your interest at your earliest convenience.

dialogue.name: NORTHOTA
dialogue.text: Aye, I'm Northota. Have you come to place a bounty on an unruly beast?

dialogue.name: NORTHOTA
dialogue.text: By the Scholar! You're Forename? I was half-convinced I'd set the others an impossible task, asking them to find you.

dialogue.name: NORTHOTA
dialogue.text: The gleaners' guildship has begun posting hunt bills, you see, in the hopes that capable individuals will take up arms to lighten our ever-increasing load...

dialogue.name: NORTHOTA
dialogue.text: Unfortunately, “capable individuals” remain the sticking point. Few hailing from our fair polis are willing to take up arms─let alone able to stand against the more fearsome specimens.

dialogue.name: NORTHOTA
dialogue.text: You, however, have the experience and the grit that we need. When I heard that you had arrived on our shores, it was music to my ears!

dialogue.name: NORTHOTA
dialogue.text: You needn't work for free, of course─we've done our research, and the rewards we offer are as fine as any you'll find abroad. The currency we employ is a relic of times when “gleaner” was a great deal less figurative, so you may find it somewhat...eccentric, but it's as good as gil here!

dialogue.name: NORTHOTA
dialogue.text: ...Speaking of eccentric, it should be noted that the majority of our clients are scholars. You probably won't have heard of half the creatures they send you after, but I find it's best not to worry about that overmuch.

dialogue.name: NORTHOTA
dialogue.text: Slay beasts, collect samples─try not to think about the long-term effects of touching said samples─and get paid. Simple, no?

dialogue.name: NORTHOTA
dialogue.text: That being said, I wouldn't dream of throwing you in the deep end just yet. Let's have you start off with some junior marks so you can get your feet wet.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You are now permitted to take bills for junior marks from guildship hunt boards in Old Sharlayan and Radz-at-Han.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Defeat the monsters described on the bills and you will be rewarded with tokens that can be exchanged for exclusive items.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: To exchange tokens for exclusive items, speak with either J'lakshai in Old Sharlayan, or with Wilmetta in Radz-at-Han.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: New quests and associate marks will become available from Northota in Old Sharlayan upon reaching level 83.

obj.n: That Specimen Came from the Moon
